column1: Only  complaint  by  the  State  is
column2:
that  the  suspension  of the  sentence  is 
illegal.  It  is

column1: mandatory to peruse the relevant law; Section  391  of the Penal  code states as  follows;
Section  391- Criminal  breach  of trust by a clerk or servant;

column2: Whoever,  being  a clerk  or servant or employed as  a clerk  or servant and being
in  such  capacity  with  property,  or  with  any
dominion  over  property,  commits  criminal  breach  of trust  in  respect  of that
property,  shall  be  punished  with  imprisonment of either description  for  a term

column1: which may extend to seven years,  and shall also be liable to  fine.
